title: LF duo Bronze
body: Need people to help duo q to rank up. It's hard to have 4 trolling team mates in the game If I have a duo q partner then it will minimise to 3 team mates that will troll. Add me cfr14u

replies.body:
Stuck in bronze 5, been to promos 5 times. Fairly competent player, still learning, but decent. Had a silver team with plat leader, scout me out and offer me games when they can't get a 5th, but waiting in wings so far.

Don't rage, very chill, online heaps

IGN: nubcone

im up just add me in game im bronze 3 with 62 lp

ow ps tell me hear if you add me so we can get on
Hey bud,  i feel ya bronze is full of trolls, Burgasmic is my user im b4 just got to it add me for a dou when im online
